mapper.insert: insert into deal (product_id, group_size, discount_price, status, participant_count, is_private, expired_at, closed_at) values (#{productId}, #{groupSize}, #{discountPrice}, #{status}, #{participantCount}, #{isPrivate}, #{expiredAt}, #{closedAt})
mapper.select: select * from deal where id = #{id} for update
mapper.update: update deal set productId=#{param.productId}, groupSize=#{param.groupSize}, discountPrice=#{param.discountPrice}, groupSize=#{param.groupSize}, participantCount=#{param.participantCount}, isPrivate=#{param.isPrivate}, expiredAt=#{param.expiredAt}, closedAt=#{param.closedAt}, where id = #{id}
